Question: Kam Yuen Plastic Products Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kam Yuen Plastic Products Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Kam Yuen Plastic Products Ltd. specializes in precision manufacturing and engineering, offering innovative solutions for personal care and household health care products.
- The company has a team of scientific researchers and operates a large-scale integrated production workshop to ensure top-quality products.
- Products are FDA, CFDA, CE, ROHS, CB, SAA, PSE, GS certified, and the factory is ISO 13485, GMP, KC, BSCI certified.
- The company is open to global OEM and ODM partnerships.
- Kam Yuen Precision Technologies, a member of the Kamyuen Group, offers precision metal components and automation technology for luxury wearables, medical devices, and robotics.

For more information, visit www.kamyuengroup.com.
